sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time/> <cooking_instructions>1. Heat vegetable oil in a wok over high heat. 2. Add minced garlic and sliced shallots, cook until fragrant. 3. Push garlic and shallots to the side of the wok and crack eggs into the empty space. Scramble until cooked. 4. Add shrimp and tofu, stir fry until shrimp is pink and tofu is golden. 5. Add soaked rice noodles and bean sprouts, toss to combine. 6. In a small bowl, mix fish sauce, tamarind paste, and sugar. Pour over the noodles and stir well. 7. Cook until noodles are tender. 8. Serve hot, garnished with crushed peanuts, chili flakes, and lime wedges.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Thai">8b495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd0</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Moderate">bee0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Rice Noodles (200g, soaked), Shrimp (200</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Pad Thai</name> <nutrition>Calories: 400, Protein: 20g, Fat: 15g, Carbs: 50g</nutrition> <owned_by/> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Soak rice noodles. 2. Peel and devein shrimp. 3. Cube tofu. 4. Mince garlic. 5. Slice shallots.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time/> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7891d71f9795021069a3b6fce053afe2</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
